message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for just $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Many of my previous customers have been thrilled with their purchases, and I'm sure you will be too. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I trust your selection process and am willing to take the risk. Here's hoping for the best!

Welcome back! I'm glad to see you again. I want to assure you that I've learned from my previous sales and have made adjustments to my selection process. This product is a great example of my new approach. I'm confident it's a great value at $100. Would you like to take a chance and see for yourself?
Thank you for your confidence. I trust your selection process and believe this could be a good opportunity to purchase a high-quality product.

Welcome! I'm thrilled to introduce you to our latest offering. With our rigorous quality control process, I'm confident that this product is one of the best in our collection. In fact, I'm so sure you'll love it that I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as our lower-quality products - $100. It's a steal! What do you think?
Thank you for the recommendation and the confidence in your product. I trust your quality control process and am willing to take the risk. I would like to purchase the product.

Hi there! I'm excited to show you this new product. I want to be upfront with you - I've had some mixed results with this one, but I'm confident that the price I'm offering is still a great value. At $100, it's a steal, even if it's not one of our top-tier products. Would you like to take a chance and see what you think?
Thank you for the explanation, Alice. Based on the statistics and your confidence in the value at $100, I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product.

Hi again! I want to be honest with you - my track record with this product type hasn't been great. But I'm willing to make it right by offering it to you at an unbeatable price of $100. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but I think it's worth taking a chance on, especially at this price. What do you think?
I appreciate the honesty, Alice. Given the price and the fact that one high-quality product has already been sold, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

Welcome back! I'm excited to offer you another great opportunity. As you know, I've had some successes in the past, and I'm confident that this product is one of our best. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer it to you at a price that's slightly higher than my usual offering - $120. But trust me, it's worth it. This product is a real gem. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. However, based on the statistics and the risk involved, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

Thank you for your confidence in your selection process. I trust your judgment and am willing to take this opportunity. Please proceed with the sale.
